To use this functionality you *must* add your games [encrypted app ticket key](https://docs.gog.com/sdk-encrypted-tickets/) from GOG Galaxy, to the [*Game Admin > Settings*](/platforms/gog/authentication/) page of your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"GOG Galaxy"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/external/galaxyauth"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request an access token on behalf of a GOG Galaxy user. To use this functionality you *must* add your games [encrypted app ticket key](https://docs.gog.com/sdk-encrypted-tickets/) from GOG Galaxy, to the [*Game Admin > Settings*](/platforms/gog/authentication/) page of your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"GOG Authentication Request","required":["appdata"],"properties":{"appdata":{"description":"The GOG Galaxy users [Encrypted App Ticket](https://cdn.gog.com/open/galaxy/sdk/1.133.3/Documentation/classgalaxy_1_1api_1_1IUser.html#a352802aab7a6e71b1cd1b9b1adfd53d8) provided by the GOG Galaxy SDK. <br /><br />Parameter content *MUST* be the encrypted string returned in the buffer after calling [IUser::GetEncryptedAppTicket()](https://cdn.gog.com/open/galaxy/sdk/1.133.3/Documentation/classgalaxy_1_1api_1_1IUser.html#a96af6792efc260e75daebedca2cf74c6) within the Galaxy SDK. Unlike the [Steam Authentication](/restapi/docs/steam) endpoint, you do not need to encode the encrypted string as this is already done by the Galaxy SDK.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ Due to the encrypted app ticket containing special characters, you must URL encode the string before sending the request to ensure it is successfully sent to our servers otherwise you may encounter an `422 Unprocessable Entity` response. For example, [cURL](https://ec.haxx.se/http-post.html) will do this for you by using the `--data-urlencode` option.","type":"string","example":"GCL671bwZ/+zUeOWc0M"},"terms_agreed":{"description":"This MUST be set to `false` unless you have collected the [users agreement](/restapi/docs/terms) prior to calling this endpoint in which case it can be set to `true` and will be recorded.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ If this is set to `false` and the user has not agreed to the latest mod.io Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, an error `403 Forbidden (error_ref 11074)` will be returned and you will need to collect the [users agreement](/restapi/docs/terms) and retry with this value set to `true` to authenticate the user.","type":"boolean","example":true},"email":{"description":"The users email address. If supplied, and the respective user does not have an email registered for their account we will send a confirmation email to confirm they have ownership of the specified email.<br /><br />__WARNING__: We __strongly recommend__ that you prompt your users in a friendly manner at least once to provide their email address to link their GOG Galaxy account to mod.io. Failing to provide an email will in-effect generate an orphan account that will only be able to be accessed from GOG Galaxy.","type":"string","example":"example@mod.io"},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date in which the returned token will expire. Value cannot be higher than the default value which is a common year (unix timestamp + 31536000 seconds). Using a token after it's expiry time has elapsed will result in a `401 Unauthorized` response.","type":"integer","example":1729236480}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Access Token Object","description":"Contains user access token.","properties":{"code":{"description":"HTTP Response Code.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":200},"access_token":{"description":"The user's access token.","type":"string","example":"eyJ0eXAiOiXKV1QibCJhbLciOiJeiUzI1....."},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date this token will expire. Default is one year from issue date. See [Access Token Lifetime & Expiry](/restapi/docs/making-requests).","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1570673249}},"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"The game associated with the supplied api_key is currently not available.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11021":"The GOG Galaxy encrypted app ticket was invalid.","11032":"mod.io was unable to verify the credentials against the external service provider.","14001":"The game associated with the supplied api_key is currently not available."}},"403":{"description":"The api_key supplied in the request must be associated with a game.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11016":"The api_key supplied in the request must be associated with a game.","11017":"The api_key supplied in the request is for test environment purposes only and cannot be used for this functionality.","11022":"The secret GOG Galaxy app ticket associated with this game has not been configured.","11074":"The user has not agreed to the mod.io Terms of Use. Please see terms_agreed parameter description and the [Terms](/restapi/docs/terms) endpoint for more information."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
